{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = AP1004WRi.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = 4-Radio Reconfigurable Wide Coverage Indoor Access Point |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.everestnetworks.com/ap1004wri |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Everest_Networks_AP1004WRi |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Everest Networks |model = AP1004 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = WRi |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = AP24I612 |wlclass = AC4900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AGMRAP24I612, 2AGMRTRM989DB, 2AGMRTRM9995G |icid = 21218-AP24I612, 21218-TRM989DB, 21218-TRM9995G |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);T1042;T1042, NSN7MQB, UYQGH1716, IN64H TAIW, GLAYUYC; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = PowerPC |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29GL512GUT2I-11G; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Aquantia;AQR112; |eth3chip = Aquantia;AQR112; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 2.5GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 2
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_poe_type = bt |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth LE, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/14/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Tembo TRM9995G |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9990; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Tembo TRM9995G |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9990; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3mod = Tembo TRM9995G |rad3modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9990; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad3ac = 800 |nqam3 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
|rad4mod = Tembo TRM989DB |rad4modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad4chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;; |rad4chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad4chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad4oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad4_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad4txchains = 3 |rad4rxchains = 3 |rad4sstreams = 3 |rad4stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam4 = 600 |rad4n = 450 |rad4g = 54 |rad4b = 11 |rad4freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The [[Tembo TRM989DB]] radio serves as the 2.4GHz bgn radio and also scans for available 5GHz DFS channels. {{FCC ST|10/31/2018|indexme.}}
==See also== *[[Everest Networks AP1002We]] • [https://www.everestnetworks.com/ap1002we PPage] *[[Everest Networks AP1004NRe]] • [https://www.everestnetworks.com/ap1004nre PPage] *[[Everest Networks AP1004WRe]] • [https://www.everestnetworks.com/ap1004wre PPage] *[[Everest Networks AP1004WRi]] • [https://www.everestnetworks.com/ap1004wri PPage]
